thread.title: George Kelley Sr
thread.title_full: Gamecheap reviewed by George Kelley Sr

author: George Kelley Sr
title: George Kelley Sr
text:
I purchased Windows 10 Pro, to upgrade from Windows 10 Home. I tried to update it as I had in past, which did not work. Richard, from Game Cheap, was patience with me, with clear instruction, which helped me to get it installed. I ended up having to use Phone activation (because of all the failed attempts) but all went well.
I do plan to buy more software in the future.
